OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupMetallurgy4Utility
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Metallurgy 4 Utility Ores.

Choice.description: Sulfur is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluSulfurFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Sulfur distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluSulfurSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Sulfur distributions

Choice.description: Phosphorite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluPhosphoriteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Phosphorite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluPhosphoriteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Phosphorite distributions

Choice.description: Saltpeter is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluSaltpeterFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Saltpeter distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluSaltpeterSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Saltpeter distributions

Choice.description: Magnesium is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluMagnesiumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Magnesium distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluMagnesiumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Magnesium distributions

Choice.description: Bitumen is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluBitumenFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Bitumen distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluBitumenSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Bitumen distributions

Choice.description: Potash is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: mtluPotashFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Potash distributions

OptionNumeric.name: mtluPotashSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Metallurgy 4 Utility Potash distributions

Substitute.name: mtluOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: mtluSulfur0Veins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: mtluSulfur1Veins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Cloud.name: mtluSulfur0Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: mtluSulfur0HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: mtluSulfur1Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: mtluSulfur1HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: mtluSulfur1Standard
StandardGen.Description: This mimics vanilla ore generation. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.
